attributes.action: Give money to theatres to keep them up and running
attributes.additional_details: I believe that Theatres are a massive part of the economy and the public love going to theatres, also paying a lot of money to go.
attributes.background: Make sure that no one working in theatre is struggling by giving money to theatre companies

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320711
